name: Slashdot Beta Fix
description: Fixing the horrible view that is the new Slashdot site. If the source was in the right order, the comments could easily wrap under the right-hand rail, but alas they're not, so this is the best you can get.
additional_info:
Version 1.0 - Initial release.
Version 1.1 - Fix font definition for reply textarea.
Version 1.2 - Fix fonts for everything in comments footer.
Version 1.3 - Fix Colours and link text size in reply preview.
